channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s new energy order puts states’ climate laws in the crosshairs of the Department of Justice
item.description: A new executive order from President Donald Trump that’s part of his effort to invigorate energy production launches the possibility that his Department of Justice will go to court against state laws aimed at slashing planet-warming greenhouse gas pollution from fossil fuels.

item.title: Americans convicted in Congo of a botched coup attempt now face US charges
A California soccer coach charged in a 13-year-old’s death is accused of assaulting other teens
